record.name: FibRgLw97
record.description:
The FibRgLw97 structure is the third section of the FIB. This contains an array of 4-byte values.

Class and fields descriptions are quoted from Microsoft Office Word 97-2007 Binary File Format and [MS-DOC] - v20110608 Word (.doc) Binary File Format
record.author: Sergey Vladimirov; according to Microsoft Office Word 97-2007 Binary File Format Specification [*.doc] and [MS-DOC] - v20110608 Word (.doc) Binary File Format

field.name: cbMac
field.description: Specifies the count of bytes of those written to the WordDocument stream of the file that have any meaning. All bytes in the WordDocument stream at offset cbMac and greater MUST be ignored.

field.name: reserved1
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved2
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: ccpText
field.description: A signed integer that specifies the count of CPs in the main document. This value MUST be zero, 1, or greater

field.name: ccpFtn
field.description: A signed integer that specifies the count of CPs in the footnote subdocument. This value MUST be zero, 1, or greater

field.name: ccpHdd
field.description: A signed integer that specifies the count of CPs in the header subdocument. This value MUST be zero, 1, or greater

field.name: reserved3
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: ccpAtn
field.description: A signed integer that specifies the count of CPs in the comment subdocument. This value MUST be zero, 1, or greater

field.name: ccpEdn
field.description: A signed integer that specifies the count of CPs in the endnote subdocument. This value MUST be zero, 1, or greater

field.name: ccpTxbx
field.description: A signed integer that specifies the count of CPs in the textbox subdocument of the main document. This value MUST be zero, 1, or greater

field.name: ccpHdrTxbx
field.description: A signed integer that specifies the count of CPs in the textbox subdocument of the header. This value MUST be zero, 1, or greater

field.name: reserved4
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved5
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved6
field.description: This value MUST be equal or less than the number of data elements in PlcBteChpx, as specified by FibRgFcLcb97.fcPlcfBteChpx and FibRgFcLcb97.lcbPlcfBteChpx. This value MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved7
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved8
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved9
field.description: This value MUST be less than or equal to the number of data elements in PlcBtePapx, as specified by FibRgFcLcb97.fcPlcfBtePapx and FibRgFcLcb97.lcbPlcfBtePapx. This value MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved10
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved11
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved12
field.description: This value SHOULD be zero, and MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved13
field.description: This value MUST be zero and MUST be ignored

field.name: reserved14
field.description: This value MUST be zero and MUST be ignored
